about_the_game:
Step into the shoes of a lone cyberpunk swordsman with a cool trick up their sleeve—learning and copying enemy skills. This game is all about turn-based action in a futuristic cyberpunk world, where strategic positioning on the 2D playing field is crucial as you battle your way to confront the final boss.

Key Features:

  • Turn-based Action: Strategize every move as each character takes their turn.

  • Rogue-like Gameplay with Progression: Encounter new enemies during gameplay, defeat them to unlock their unique skills.

  • Deck Building Elements: Experiment with various combos and construct your starter deck to bring with you.

  • Replayability: Experience randomized enemies in each run, ensuring no two runs are alike.
  • Unique enemies: Encounter diverse enemies, each bringing a new challenge to overcome.

  • Unique maps: Each part of the game has a unique set of enemies, synergizing with each other, bringing new challenges.

At the end of the day though, it’s YOUR skills as a player that matter most!
This game is a journey of continual improvement, transforming once-daunting obstacles into a stroll in the park.

name: Cyber Tile

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 1.7+ GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Cyber Tile is a turn-based strategy game, mixing rogue-like gameplay with building your deck. Time your moves right, upgrade your skills, and combine them to prepare for challenging encounters with various enemies and the final boss!
supported_languages: English, Hungarian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
